com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget
Class WPPivotHeader.FadeOutListener

java.lang.Object
  com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.WPPivotHeader.FadeOutListener
Enclosing class:
WPPivotHeader
public static final class WPPivotHeader.FadeOutListener
extends java.lang.Object

Ensures that the child being faded out will be removed when the fade out in complete, and prevents a NullPointerException thrown by dispatchDraw when done too fast. It also bounds child removal based on limit so as to prevent removing too many children and causing other issues.

See Also:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3025163/how-to-remove-a-view-when-animation-ends
